scripts.postinstall: npm run deps; YENV=${YENV:-${NODE_ENV}} npm run configs
scripts.gemini: $(npm bin)/http-server -s & p=$!; $(npm bin)/gemini test --reporter html --reporter flat; e=$?; kill -TERM ${p}; exit ${e}
scripts.gemini-dist: DIR=`mktemp -dt 'c2c'`; tar -xf $(cat .dist) -C ${DIR}; $(npm bin)/http-server ${DIR} -s & p=$!; $(npm bin)/gemini test --reporter html --reporter flat; e=$?; kill -TERM ${p}; rm -rf ${DIR}; exit ${e}
scripts.gemini-site: .scripts/yconf.sh silent && . configs/current/settings.sh; BASEURL=${BASEURL} $(npm bin)/gemini test --reporter html --reporter flat
scripts.gemini-update: $(npm bin)/http-server -c "no-cache, no-store" -s & p=$!; $(npm bin)/gemini update; kill -TERM ${p}
